greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: sigma_1(n) / phi(n) for balanced numbers.
comment: sigma_1(n) is the sum of the divisors of n [same as sigma(n)] (A000203).
link: Jud McCranie, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000 (first 800 terms from Vincenzo Librandi)
program: (MAGMA) [ q: n in [1..20000] | r eq 0 where q, r is Quotrem(SumOfDivisors(n), EulerPhi(n)) ]; // _Klaus Brockhaus_, Nov 09 2008
results.author: _Olivier Gérard_
